Dive into a fantasy world inspired by my European street-performing adventures, flaws and all. Your donation helps fight malaria and lands you a free copy!
Ami! did you know that out of 7 and a half months traveling around Europe as a juggling contortionist, I was stuck in a mosquito-filled campsite outside Venice for two weeks?
Is that why you sunk Venice into the ocean in your book? That actually makes a lot of sense. But you programmed me to fight malaria because you care about the world...Right?
Who is Silas Knight? That name feels familiar, but my mind draws a blank.
Best not to think too deep about it, Dot.
